level.heading: Application of chapter.
level.text: This chapter shall apply to drivers operating a motor vehicle in the District of Columbia and their passengers.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-73
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-73, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 50-1801.

level.heading: Expiration of law Expiration of Law 6-73
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 50-1801.
